name: Gloop (SDf)
description:
Play as Gloop the alien and escape the underground laboratory that has captured him! When Gloop dies he teleports back to his UFO, use this to your advantage!

Be careful to have the vials Gloop needs to teleport back to his UFO in later levels!

Controls:
  • A/D - Move Left/Right
  • S - Down
  • Space - Jump
  • Left Mouse Click - Grab/Throw UFO
Credits:
  • SDf (@icy_float) - Programming, Art, SFX, Music

I used Godot 3.5, Aseprite (art), Chiptone (sfx) and PICO-8 (music).
